Dear All,

I confess I wasn't following this story when it broke, because I 
assumed the sword used was some cheap, mall knockoff. This article 
states that it was a 17th century Nihonto, and that it was disposed 
of in a dumpster. Does anyone know whether the blade was recovered???

http://www.nydailynews.com/front/story/471939p-397012c.html

Regards,

Andres
